verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6767>shadowing<s%> with <S%H3671>wings,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia:<s%>

That <S%H7971>sends<s%> <S%H6735>ambassadors<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> even in <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H1573>bulrushes<s%> on the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> saying, <S%H3212>Go,<s%> you <S%H7031>swift<s%> <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> to a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H4900>scattered<s%> and <S%H4178>peeled,<s%> to a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>terrible<s%> from their <S%H1931>beginning<s%> till <S%H1973>now;<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6978>meted<s%> out and <S%H4001>trodden<s%> down, <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> have <S%H958>spoiled!<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world,<s%> and <S%H7931>dwellers<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> you, when he <S%H5375>lifts<s%> up an <S%H5251>ensign<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> and when he <S%H8628>blows<s%> a <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> you.

For <S%H3541>so<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, I will take my <S%H8252>rest,<s%> and I will <S%H5027>consider<s%> in my <S%H4349>dwelling<s%> place like a <S%H6703>clear<s%> <S%H2527>heat<s%> on <S%H219>herbs,<s%> and like a <S%H5645>cloud<s%> of <S%H2919>dew<s%> in the <S%H2527>heat<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>

For <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> when the <S%H6525>bud<s%> is <S%H8552>perfect,<s%> and the <S%H1155>sour<s%> <S%H1155>grape<s%> is <S%H1580>ripening<s%> in the <S%H5328>flower,<s%> he shall both <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H2150>sprigs<s%> with <S%H4211>pruning<s%> hooks, and <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> and <S%H8456>cut<s%> down the <S%H5189>branches.<s%>

They shall be <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> to the <S%H5861>fowls<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and to the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and the <S%H5861>fowls<s%> shall <S%H6972>summer<s%> on them, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H2778>winter<s%> on them.

In that <S%H6256>time<s%> shall the <S%H7862>present<s%> be <S%H2986>brought<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> of a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4900>scattered<s%> and <S%H4178>peeled,<s%> and from a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>terrible<s%> from their <S%H1931>beginning<s%> till <S%H1973>now;<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6978>meted<s%> out and <S%H4001>trodden<s%> under <S%H4001>foot,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> have <S%H958>spoiled,<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
